channel.title: reporting on Taiga Resources
channel.description: Recent content in reporting on Taiga Resources

item.title: Taiga reporting capabilities for managing teams & projects
item.description: Taiga focuses on soft reporting across the entire platform plus convenient API and live CSV exports.

item.title: CSV reports
item.description: In Taiga you can make reports with some data and graph about your projects.

item.title: What is Taiga's reporting capabilities?
item.description: Taiga has both built-in reporting capabilities and the possibility of exporting real-time live CSV links to other reporting tools such as spreadsheets.
